name: Pete (Craapy)
description:
You play as a small Bird called Pete that fell out of his Tree and now has to get back. You fight against Spiders, Larva and Flys with a Hollow Knight like Combat System in a cute 16x16 Art Style.

The Game was made for the Secret Santa Game Jam.

It lacks Audio and is quite unpolished but I will work on the Game in the Future and Fix it's Problems and add more Content to it.
